chatinputcommands.troll: Play with discretion a song in the voice channel of an user

response_msg.leave: Thank you for using BaBot ! See you next time with the command </player:1052609017802924062> !
response_msg.inactivity: I've left due to inactivity. See you next time with the command </player:1052609017802924062> !
response_msg.hide: Player closed. You can open it again using </player:1052609017802924062>
response_msg.stay_until_user: ✅ I stay here and I ask you again the next time I'm alone
response_msg.golden_level: <:golden:1065239445625917520> Sorry, this feature is reserved to Golden level users (See `/help -> Golden`)

add_song_modal.title: Add a song
add_song_modal.placeholder: Enter a link or a search term
add_song_modal.label: Song / Playlist
add_song_modal.enter_song: ❌ You need to input a link or a search terms
add_song_modal.search_too_long: ❌ Your search request cannot exceed 250 characters

wait_vote_embed.title: Your command will launch <t:{timestamp}:R>
wait_vote_embed.description:
**Don't want to wait ?**
- Vote for BaBot [on Top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/1052586565395828778/vote) (no delay during 3 days)
- Subscribe to Golden (see `/help -> Golden`)
wait_vote_embed.footer: If this appears even after voting, please report the issue with /feedback

troll_success:
✅ Song played
<:transparent:1067551646592282694> NB : Toggle trolling in </settings:1065334689021296671> or in `/config troll`

player_embed.description_idle:
**Add a music in the queue to start listening**.
Tutorial on the thumbnail ➡️
player_embed.description_configure:
Configure the permissions users have on the player
Click on the thumbnail for help
player_embed.style_placeholder: Select a custom style for the player

errors.guild_only: 💥 You can only use this command in a guild
errors.not_in_voice_channel: ❌ Please join a voice channel to use this command
errors.user_not_in_voice_channel: ❌ This user isn't in a voice channel
errors.join: ❌ I can't join your voice channel, please check my permissions
errors.speak: ❌ I'm not allowed to speak in your voice channel, please check my permissions
errors.full: ❌ Your voice channel is full (I need the "Move members" permission to override this)
errors.already_used: ❌ I'm already used in an other channel
errors.unknown_player_error: 💥 The player couldn't be initialized, but I don't know why. Normally this error is impossible to trigger so gg
errors.search_cache_error: 💥 I can't find your song in the search cache
errors.dont_disturb: 🤫 This member has asked to not be disturbed by trolling
errors.troll_disabled_guild: 🤫 The troll command is disabled by the server admins
errors.song_not_found: ❌ This song doesn't exist. Please select a song in the displayed list
errors.player_already_used: ❌ I'm currently playing music. To avoid disturbing my listeners, I refuse to move
errors.no_player: ❌ I'm no longer in a voice channel. Start a new playing session with the command </player:1052609017802924062>
errors.not_alone: 💥 I'm no longer alone in the voice channel
errors.not_my_channel: ❌ You can't control me if you're not in my channel
errors.disabled_by_owner: ❌ The session owner has disabled this control
errors.disabled_by_admin: ❌ The server administrators have disabled this control
errors.owner_only: ❌ Only the session owner ({username}) can use this command
